# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within MCPÂ², please do NOT report it publicly (e.g., via GitHub issues).

Instead, please report it via:
*   Private disclosure via GitHub Security Advisories (preferred)

If private reporting is unavailable, open a regular issue without sensitive details and request a secure contact channel.

We will investigate all reports and provide a response.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.x     | :white_check_mark: |
